alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, BULLOCH, EFFINGHAM, CHATHAM AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 744 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Ellabell, or 7 miles east of Pembroke, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Pooler, Springfield, Pembroke, Savannah International Airport, Godley Station, Lanier, Rincon and Port Wentworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bulloch; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham
